name: LOCKDOWN (ra-kun, Aspyse, centuriee)
description:
• The player has to balance the following resources: funds, work/academic performance, personal well being, and availability of day-to-day necessities
  • Each week, the player’s resources will decay. The player may choose actions to focus on for the week, each action offering unique combinations of additions/deductions to their resources
  • Depending on certain factors, such as the state of the player’s resources or actions taken, random events may occur--during which the player has to make decisions that affect the progression of the game
  • Actions that involve contact with other people will have differing risks of contracting the virus, further depending on the status of the player’s well being

[ Mouse for in-game actions ]
